## Certs interface

Provides methods to manage SSL/TLS certificates

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Certs 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [deleteCert(certId)](./api-certs.certs.deletecert.md) | Delete certificate |
|  [getCert(certId)](./api-certs.certs.getcert.md) | Get issued certificate |
|  [getCertMetadata(certId)](./api-certs.certs.getcertmetadata.md) | Get certificate metadata. |
|  [listCerts(options)](./api-certs.certs.listcerts.md) | List certificates |
|  [requestCert(domain, options)](./api-certs.certs.requestcert.md) | Request a new certificate |
